questions.question: Do you plan to vote in the 1996 elections?
Concerning issues of importance,how would you prefer to contact you elected officials?
questions.answer: Writing a letter, Sending an E-mail, Sending a fax, Making a telephone call, Making an office visit

questions.question: Have you written a letter to the editor of your local newspaper about issues of importance to you?
If no, would you be willing to write a letter to the editor of your local newspaper?
Do you have access to on-line or Internet services?
On which of the topics below would you most likely voice your opinion to elected officials?
questions.answer: Government regulations of tobacco sales and use, Excise taxes on tobacco products, Smoking restrictions/bans in public places, restaurants or workplaces, Youth access to tobacco products

questions.question: Do you receive the Smokers Advocate newsletter about issues concerning smokers' rights?
If no, would you like to receive this free newsletter?
